/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a canopy of greenery over the urban landscape. People can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, indicating a well-organized traffic system. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
